org.trianacode.gui.main

Interface NodeComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CircleNode, TrianaNode

    public interface NodeComponent
    An interface implemented by all components that can be used to represent nodes

    • Method Summary

        Returns:
        this component

      • getNode

        Node getNode()
        Returns:
        the interface to the node this component represents

      • isOutputNode

        boolean isOutputNode()
        Returns:
        true if the node represented by this component is an output node

      • isInputNode

        boolean isInputNode()
        Returns:
        true if the node represented by this component is an input node

      • isConnectable

        boolean isConnectable()
        Returns:
        true if the node represented by this component can be connected to/connected from
